titleStmt.title: Gangrænachrestum, or A plaister to alay the tumor, and prevent the spreading of a pernitious vlcer, like to have grown upon, and putrified the good report of Jo. Maddocks, and Henry Pinnell. Made up of a true relation (wherein the faults of the former impression by Master Edwards are revised, corrected, and amended) concerning some passages at Pool. / By the abused parties I.M. and H.P.
titleStmt.author: Maddocks, John.

titleStmt.title: Gangrænachrestum, or A plaister to alay the tumor, and prevent the spreading of a pernitious vlcer, like to have grown upon, and putrified the good report of Jo. Maddocks, and Henry Pinnell. Made up of a true relation (wherein the faults of the former impression by Master Edwards are revised, corrected, and amended) concerning some passages at Pool. / By the abused parties I.M. and H.P.
titleStmt.author: Maddocks, John.
Pinnell, Henry.

notesStmt.note: "Thomason notes that it is London printing, .. But for once he is wrong: it is real Oxford printing by Henry Hall"--Madan.
A reply to: Edwards, Thomas. Gangræna.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
